pages.text: Right click to switch between modes for the golems.$(li)Following Mode: the default mode. Golem follows player.$(li)Guarding mode: Golem will stay around a region as if the player stands there. Center point is the position of the golem when it's set to this mode.$(li)Golems in standing mode will not move.
Wand for switching behavior of the golem.$(br2)Golems in guarding/standing mode cannot change dimensions, and will switch back to following mode when retrieved.
